greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Riordan array ((1+x^2)/(1-x^3),x).
comment: Sequence array for the sequence F(L((n+2)/3)). Row sums are A093878. Diagonal sums are A051275. Inverse is A117568.
reference: Murat Sahin and Elif Tan, Conditional (strong) divisibility sequences, Fib. Q., 56 (No. 1, 2018), 18-31.
link: D. Panario, M. Sahin, Q. Wang, A family of Fibonacci-like conditional sequences, INTEGERS, Vol. 13, 2013, #A78.
formula: Number triangle T(n,k)=F(L((n-k+2)/3))[k<=n] where L(j/p) is the Legendre symbol of j and p.
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Mar 29 2006
